 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package cellularAutomata.rules.templates

Class Summary
BinaryRuleTemplate A template/convenience class for all rules that behave as boolean function of their neighbors.
ComplexMargolusTemplate A convenience class/template for all rules that use the Margolus neighborhood with complex number states.
ComplexRuleTemplate A convenience class/template for any rules that need cell states based on a complex number.
ComplexVectorRuleTemplate A convenience class/template for any rules that need cell states based on an array of complex values.
CyclicCATemplate A convenience class/template for all rules that behave as so-called Cyclic CA.
FiniteDifferenceTemplate A convenience class/template for any rules that need cell states based on a double value.
FiniteObjectRuleTemplate A convenience class/template for all rules that have a finite number of states of any type (for example, Complex numbers, Doubles, Colors, Images, Files, or even a mix of different types).
IntegerMargolusTemplate A convenience class/template for all rules that use the Margolus neighborhood with integer states.
IntegerRuleTemplate A convenience class/template for all rules that behave as an integer function of their neighbors.
IntegerRuleWithCellsTemplate Almost identical to the IntegerRuleTemplate class (see that description).
IntegerVectorRuleTemplate A convenience class/template for any rules that need cell states based on an integer array of values.
LifeExtensionsTemplate A convenience class/template for all rules that behave similar to the Life rule with births occurring when a certain number of neighbors are occupied, and survivals occurring when a certain number of neighbors are occupied.
MultiGenerationBinaryRuleTemplate A template/convenience class for all rules that behave as boolean function of their neighbors at the current and some previous number of time steps.
MultiGenerationIntegerRuleTemplate A convenience class/template for all rules that behave as an integer function of their neighbors, both at the current time step and for an arbitrary number of previous time steps.
ObjectRuleTemplate A convenience class/template for any rules that need cell states based on an Object.
OneDimensionalIntegerMargolusTemplate A convenience class/template for all rules that use the one-dimensional Margolus neighborhood with integer states.
OneDimensionalRealMargolusTemplate A convenience class/template for all rules that use the one-dimensional Margolus neighborhood with real-valued states.
RealMargolusTemplate A convenience class/template for all rules that use the Margolus neighborhood with real-valued states.
RealRuleTemplate A convenience class/template for any rules that need cell states based on a double value.
RealVectorRuleTemplate A convenience class/template for any rules that need cell states based on a double array of values.
